p: We then calculate the difference sequence, the maximum difference and the minimum difference. The absolute value of the difference between x 0′ and x i ′ corresponding point k ( k = 1, 2, ..., n represents the number of observation objects) constitutes a difference sequence. In this study, x 0′ ( k) is the value of the NDVI pixel processed by the initial value method in the k year and x i′ ( k) is the value of climatic factors pixel processed by the initial value method in the k year.
